### 2025.06.25
tmux 0-2:
- [x] 1
```
getSparseGraph:
# adj_mat[:self.n_mashups, :self.n_mashups] = mmR
# adj_mat[self.n_mashups:, self.n_mashups:] = aaR

getDiffSparseGraph:
adj_mat[:self.n_mashups, :self.n_mashups] = mmR
adj_mat[self.n_mashups:, self.n_mashups:] = aaR
```

tmux 3:
- [x] 0
```
getSparseGraph:
adj_mat[:self.n_mashups, :self.n_mashups] = mmR
adj_mat[self.n_mashups:, self.n_mashups:] = aaR

getDiffSparseGraph:
adj_mat[:self.n_mashups, :self.n_mashups] = mmR
adj_mat[self.n_mashups:, self.n_mashups:] = aaR
```
